summary: Questions the burning mystery of intimate heterosexual and homosexual relations in times of war. And shows how being close to death reinforces the yearning for passion.
cast: Anouchka Delon|Patrick Buisson|Gisèle Guillemot|Max Bayer|Benoîte Groult|Pierre Barillet|Yvette Lebon|Francine S.
title: Amour et Sexe sous l'Occupation
